title: rAjAdhi rajarAjan nandakumAra rAjan
sahitya:
rAjAdhi rAja rAjan nandakumAra rAjan koluvirundAn rAjagOpAlan koluvirundAn
mangaiyar aSTa mahiSigaL puDai shUzha nallavar tudi sheyya nADellAm vAzha


anupallavi

  rAjAdi rAjargaL nAthaqnaik-kaNDu jagannAthA nAthA enru pADinadaik-kaNDu
AjAnubhAhuvAi ayyan mukham kaNDu arugil rukmiNi shenr-ennennamO shonnadu kaNDu


caraNam 1    eTTu manam viNNai eTTu maNamAgha indran manatullE taruNamidenrAgha 
naTTam paDu munnam nADi vandAgha nAraNan avai irundu varuga enrAgha
    caraNam 2    vandavar cAmarattai vAngi ninru vIsa mangaiyar manattuLLE yArivan enrEsa 
inda vaNNattaik-kaNDu kaNNAlE pEsha indran adai arindu innam innam vIsa
    caraNam 3    nAradar avaip-paNNai nanrAghap-pADa naDu ninra avaiyAr tuNaiviyili paN pADa
Uravar kaNDu EdO oliyaTrup-pOgha uDalAyiram kaNNan uNarndAn nanrAgha
